text: Ilerioluwa Oladimeji Aloba (3 January 1996 \- 12 September 2023) was a Nigerian musician who was known all over the world as a rapper. He died in suspicious circumstances on 12 September 2023 only to be buried the following day. However, the Lagos State Police Command has exhumed his body and an autopsy has been carried out in order to determine the actual cause of his death. The police also arrested the nurse who treated the late singer before he died. On 21 September 2023, Niran Adedokun wrote in the Punch Newspapers that Mohbad "was hugely talented and in tune with the very spirit of music". ==References== Category:1996 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Nigerian singers
title: MohBad
